original_text: Joshua continued to point his spear at Ai, until his army had killed every person who lived there.
korean_text: 아이 주민들을 진멸하여 바치기까지 여호수아가 단창을 잡아 든 손을 거두지 아니하였고

sentences.original_text: Joshua continued to point his spear at Ai
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아는 아이를 향해 그의 창을 계속 겨누었다

sentences.original_text: until his army had killed every person
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 군대가 모든 사람을 죽일 때까지
